name: Kris of Unspoken Names
tooltip:
Kris of Unspoken NamesLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Ornate Hilt, 2  Onyx Idols, 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Ornate Hilt
- Onyx Idol x 2
- Gold Scarab x 5
- Clay Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
